mdRecord.dcterms:title: Members of French and British Missions Process to Washington's Tomb at Mount Vernon, April 29, 1917
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harris & Ewing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of members of the French and British Missions processing to Washington's tomb at Mount Vernon. The group is lead by U. S. Secretary of State, Robert Lansing and Arthur J. Balfour, head of the British Mission. The photographer's name [Harris & Ewing] is embossed in the bottom right corner. Two holes and grommets are punched at left edge.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
